tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Like every other reader here, we also did a thorough research and went through online reviews and stumbled upon Dr. Gayatri's Profileand decided to consult her.  And that we believe was one of the best decisions we made for the journey we were getting into. Right from the beginning of my Pregnancy till the end and even now post pregnancy, the experience with her has been very smooth and rewarding. She is very humble, friendly, and caring. The best thing about her is, she clears all our doubts patiently and explains everything in very detail (sometimes along with the diagrams :p) which definitely helps in calming our anxious pregnant brains and puts it to peace. She is all about staying fit and healthy through out pregnancy, encourages walking,  keeping weight in check, eating healthy, exercises, yoga, etc. She caters to all our needs and give us all the time we need. She from the beginning encouraged for normal delivery. I almost gave up and asked for C-Section during labour, she kept encouraging me and I had normal delivery. Also, towards the end of the pregnancy, she was available on call and whatsapp responding to all my questions and doubts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Like many of the readers, I also started my association with Dr. Gayathri after going through all the online reviews. But after almost a year of knowing her, we have transitioned from readers to reviewers. 

During the early stages of our pregnancy journey, we tried a couple of OB-GYN consultants recommended by our friends. However, owing to reasons like long waiting period, distance etc. my wife and I decided to check for other options in and around Begur/Akshayanagar/Yellenahalli area. Luckily, we stumbled upon Dr. Gayathri’s profile and we started consulting her in March 2021.

She comes across as someone who is very approachable and always has time and patience to address your questions. Despite meeting many patients, she very well understands that a patient has only one doctor and it is evident from the way she calmly explains every minute aspect. 

As mentioned in many reviews, we have experienced and benefited from her home remedies. She always encouraged normal delivery and suggested exercises to improve chances of the same.

In our case, my wife had a condition called placenta previa. In such cases if the condition persists till the time of delivery, a normal delivery is not the most preferable option. However, Gayathri ma’am kept encouraging us to do walking and fortunately during later stages of pregnancy, we no longer had that condition.

During the delivery, we had ‘meconium in womb’ complication. Fortunately, Ma’am had proactively identified it and delivered our baby in time.

We are grateful to Dr. Gayathri and definitely recommend her for any OB/GYN concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: During regular yearly full body check up, my mother was diagnosed with bilateral ovarian cysts. Immediately, without second thought we contacted Dr. Gayathri B N for her opinion and she explained the condition and the future complications that could occur because of the condition in older women. She advised her to undergo laparoscopic BSO and hysterectomy surgery. Dr. Gayathri clearly explained the procedure in detail, clarified all our doubts and eased my mother into the procedure. The laparoscopic surgery was carried out by her and it went well. My mother had slight pain only on the night of the surgery and was fine from the very next day and even started walking with minimal support. Dr. Gayathri takes care of her patients very well and never denied help and support whenever we contacted her for any queries. She answers all the questions very politely and patiently. Unlike most of the doctors, she doesn’t prescribe medicines unnecessarily and advises her patients dietary changes and natural remedies to address simple conditions. Post surgery care has been fantastic and my mother is recovering well. This is proof that my mother was in good hands. * *********** *** ******** ** ******** ** *** ** *** ** *** **** ************** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Endometriosis,Infertility in Women,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: One of my friend referred me to Dr Gayathri for my fertility treatment. Literally, I wasted 9 years of my married life without knowing about/ meeting her. she carefully listened to my problems, analysed my previous reports and treated me. Touchwood. she kept me motivated with her positive words throughout my medication and pregnancy period. She mostly suggested natural remedies during my pregnancy sickness. Also, She made sure I don't roam around for blood tests or scans. she ensures her patients don't spend much until very much necessary. I opted for a planned C-Sec after my 36 weeks and she agreed to that. She was such a sweet heart. She made sure my delivery experience was very smooth.After my delivery also, I constantly followed her exercises to lose my mummy tummy and never had a C-section back pain.Meeting her was the best decision I took in my life and she changed my entire life today. we were happily holding our son for my 10th year Anniversary. My son is 15 months old now and touchwood, till date I never had any post pregnancy issues. Thank you so much Dr.Gayathri. I strongly recommend her for anyone who is longing for parenting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Gayathri Madam, please accept our sincere thanks for helping me to sail through the pregnancy stretch in the safe environment. 
I have no words to express my gratitude. Your vast experience and humanity touch has made my journey a memorable one. In spite of some complications, you encouraged me for normal delivery. Happy times started as we welcomed a baby boy through a safe Normal Delivery!!!!!
During the day of delivery, Dr. Gayathri madam showcased great commitment as always and made every possible way to stay with me, promising her to a safe end. 
I would like to say Dr. Gayathri madam always addresses an issue with a smile first. This relieves the patient of any sort of concerns. We traveled from Hyderabad to Bangalore during pregnancy and the best thing that happened is to meet Gayathri Madam. She always is patient-centric and very flexible with appointments. She is very accessible to patients outside of the consultation period. Your vision looking at a problem completely changes as you meet her.
I would like to sincerely thank Dr. Gayathri madam from bottom of my heart for helping me throughout and helping to have a safe NORMAL DELIVERY.
I strongly feel and recommend Dr. Gayathri B N madam as a great choice without any hesitation. Thanks a lot, madam.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had PCOD issues and its taking time for me to get conceive. We waited for few months like this and times were running month by month to get conceive. Then decided to consult one good doctor.

It was by our random pick and choose option to consult, Dr Gayathri BN  by reading through feedback posted on medical forums like practo, google reviews etc.
But our option didn't go in vain, post the consultation with Gayathri ma'm, now the result of happiness is with us. The same parent who gave up hopes of becoming parent is now proud parent to cute twins now. 

If you follow the guidelines and treatments set up by the doctor for sure the result will be with you, despite all the roller coaster ride you are gonna face during your treatment tenure.

Dr. Gayathri B N is incredible. Not only she had taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with us at every appointment. It’s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
We started consulting Dr.Gayathri when my wife was 3months pregnant. Since then she has been very helpful and taking personal care of my wife. When my wife was at 24 weeks, her water broke, she had contractions, I had to rush her to Milann hospital. Dr. Gayathri handled this and she was at the hospital immediately after my wife got admitted. With all the medications and doctor’s support, my wife got discharged in a week & was advised bed rest till the term. Dr. Gayathri was always available to us on phone - over the call as well as WhatsApp. Dr. Gayathri assisted us throughout without having us to visit the hospital. She even gave her personal Doppler and taught us to monitor the baby’s heartbeat frequently. That helped us a lot. At 28 weeks my wife’s water broke again and was rushed to hospital and was under observation for a night as per Dr. Gayathri’s advice. Next day she had to get an emergency C-Section due to her severe contractions. Dr. Gayathri took a real quick call to operate and my wife delivered a boy baby. Though being a premature baby, now he is doing really well. My wife is doing well too and thanks to Dr. Gayathri for assisting us post pregnancy as well.
We hearty recommend Dr. Gayathri at any given point in time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly, a big thank you to Dr. Gayathri B N She gets it!! I had an issue with endometrial cyst which was quite complicated and due to which I was not able to conceive and also had horrible pain during periods. We initially had consulted few other doctors for the same but that did not help. Then we visited to Dr. Gayathri B N and found her extremely positive. She explains everything in detail and suggested some top notch tests, prescribed few medicines and asked us to try naturally and under her treatment, we conceived the very next cycle.

Moreover,I also had cervix shortening issues in my 22nd week of pregnancy and risk of premature delivery but only with her guidance we completed 38 weeks. She answered all our queries with patience and was available over whatsapp and calls during emergency. Inspite of all the complications associated we were blessed with a little angel on 4th Jan. Special mention to Dr. Gayathri B N, she has been extremely helpful and motivated us in our pregnancy journey.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
**** ************ ** *********

Dr.Gayathri ma'am guided and supported me through out my pregnancy journey. Being my first pregnancy, I was very anxious and tensed. She used to explain even minute stuff very patiently, and motivated me by boosting my confidence. Ma'am is polite, warm and very friendly.

Her positive attitude is infectious. Ma'am is a normal delivery expert. From day1, she used to encourage exercising, walking and proper diet habits to increase the chances of normal delivery.  At times, even when I lose hope, she used to always encourage for normal delivery.

She is available 24/7 including late nights(we used to message her for emergencies and she used to reply each and every time).

By following the guidance, care and treatment plans suggested by gayathri ma'am, I could deliver a healthy baby via normal vaginal delivery inspite of complexities during pregnancy.
She has been a guiding light from day 1 of pregnancy till the delivery room. She was actually holding my hand and sharing tips to push in delivery room.

Also the tips and suggestions shared by ma'am post delivery were very very helpful.

Thank you so much ma’am for all your support and guidance. Definitely will recommend ma'am for friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
It was my first pregnancy when I consulted doctor Gayathri and I am so thankful that she was my Gyno . 
The best part about Dr. Gayathri is : 
- She is just one text away whenever you have any questions or problems which is very usual during pregnancy. 
- She always suggest home remedies and solutions and hardly suggest you any medicine. (Which is highly appreciated during pregnancy) 
- She is a normal delivery expert.  I was little doubtful whether to go for Normal delivery or C sec but she really motivated me to have a normal delivery. So if you want to have a normal delivery trust me she should be your go to person. 
- She prepared me from the beginning itself for normal delivery. She suggested me yoga and walk which worked out really well for me . 
- Not just this , infact she supported me till my labour room during my delivery. She literally holded my hand and motivated me to push . 
Overall I would rate my experience with her 10/10 . 
She is very friendly and such a supportive Gyno with great positive attitude. Highly recommend for first time parents like us and others too who is looking for a Gyno . 
She have been a saviour and a great motivator for me. Thanks mam for always being there during my pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review:
We were extremely lucky to get Dr. Gayathri. This was my wives' first pregnancy and we wanted someone who listens to us and guides us throughout the journey. From Day 1 she gave us confidence. Throughout the pregnancy she kept on motivating us for normal delivery. Always advised natural remedies like walking for stress relief and back pain, jeera water for gastric issues, etc. She remembered my wives medical history and kept on monitoring her health, like BP, diabetes. She prescribed medicines and scans as and when needed. 
She gave us her phone number and always responded to our calls and messages.
We had a lot of questions, but still she patiently listened and answered all of them one by one. At times, consultation time used to be more than 15 mins.
We were very satisfied with her. 
Unfortunately, my wife had to go for C-Section delivery due to some complications, but the doctor waiting till the last moment for normal delivery.
I would also like to mention that we never faced issues like appointment getting cancelled or waiting too much for an appointment.

I would definitely recommend Dr. Gayathri to all.

tags: None
review: Doctor was in a hurry to leave. For obvious reasons when someone touch patient vaginas, there may be initial resistance but it doesn't mean she shall say on report Patient didn't let examine. Patient asked her to go ahead. Then doctor was able to find actual reason and just speculated something and gave prescription which includes quite a few medicines. ** *** *** ***** ***** **** *** ************ ** ** *** ******** ******* ****** ********* ** ** ** ******** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We have consulted Dr. Gayathri since 4th month of my pregnancy and blessed with Baby girl through normal delivery. We would like to thank doctor for always being a text away, answering all our queries with utmost patience and giving us the right guidance throughout with great moral support. Her guidance to be active during pregnancy has boosted my confidence which also helped me to enjoy my pregnancy. She also motivated me to have a natural delivery.

We would like to thank doctor for taking such a good care of us to have our princess. Thank you Mam!

Regards,
Vibha, Prithvi & little princess :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr.Gayathri BN at Spectra Diagnostics, Akshaya Nagar for My Wife's Pregnancy checkup....She has taken care of everything and explained very well...and she always try for NORMAL Delivery only...For my wife also NORMAL Delivery.
We have choosen for Rajashri Grandhim Hospital, Vijaya Bank layout for Delivery.
Dr. taken all necessary actions and co ordinated with Hospital Staff for Normal delivery processor....My Baby now 10 Months, Today again visited Dr. For regular checkup...Same Smile and explained very well.
Don't Look for anything,. Will strongly recommend Dr.Gayathri B N for NORMAL DELIVERY.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Tests,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: Dr. Gayatri is a friendly person who understands common man's problems and provide medications and solutions in ** ********* *** efficient manner. She explains the issues and solutions in simple manner and shows great patience in making us understand each and every clarification we need. She has referred me to good places for tests and IVF treatment which ultimately gained me motherhood post 5 years of varied struggle. I am blessed with a baby girl and I cannot thank Doctor enough for helping me achieve this bliss. She has always been thoughtful about suggesting cost effective treatment and has provided very minimal medications that too only when needed. She highly recommends natural ways like exercise, yoga, good diet to fight various complications. This approach of her's has helped me a lot to resolve my complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
This was my first pregnancy and i went through two miscarriage before due to thyroid. We were tensed but She has listened to all my health issues and taken care of every single issue and prescribed medicine on time. Eventhough there was many complications, she always motivated us for normal delivery. She remembered all my  medical history and keep on monitoring my health issues like thyroid,liver infection, sugar, CBC etc. She always responded to all my queries over phone.

I have to go through early delivery due to liver functionining issue but still had a normal delivery.


We were very happy and satisfied with Dr. Gayathri and highly recommend to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We (my wife - Rekha Singh) started consulting Dr. Gayathri around a year ago as she came highly recommended by many of our friends and acquaintance.  My wife had miscarried during the 7th month of previous pregnancy due to high BP issues and since then had developed hypertension. She inquired into minute details, understood our problem very well and explained the options available to us in a very friendly manner. She continued this at every stage of pregnancy, taking us into confidence about every decision she took. Under her friendly guidance and expertise my wife delivered a healthy baby boy on 4th July 2020, despite being a high risk case. From being a great doctor she became our strength and saw us through this ordeal. Today we are proud parents of a 5 day old Arush. Thank you once again for everything Doctor and hope that many more to be parents benefit from your wisdom and ability.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Cervical Cerclage,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
Dr Gayathri has guided and supported me in all the 9 months of my very first pregnancy. She helped me to overcome all the downs of my pregnancy as i had thyroid, gestational diabetes, short cervix and low heemoglobin but still i could deliver a healthy baby via normal vaginal delivery because of her support and understanding. She took care of my each and every problem and ensured normal delivery even after my poor efforts in delivery room. At one point of my labor when i was not able to bear the pain of contractions and i wanted to have cesarean, she motivated me and my husband to have normal delivery as she knew we always wanted our baby via normal delivery. She is very polite, listens to your problem and gives you right advise.

Thank you so much ma’am for all your support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy,
review: It was my first pregnancy and Dr. Gayathri was very very supportive from day one throughout my 9 months journey. She was very concerned as I was Anemic and took good care of this issue and made sure that things would go fine till my delivery. She has lots of patience to listen and to answer all our queries. She encouraged me for normal delivery from day one by suggesting me to stay active through out my pregnancy by going for walks and to do Yoga. She also ensured that I eat the right kind of food and gained the required weight for pregnancy. She was always available on phone for any of my urgent queries or problems. In spite of my poor maternal efforts, she made sure that I had a normal delivery as promised. I highly recommend her for any one who is looking for a good, supportive and motivating Gyno in Rainbow Hospital Bannerghatta Road. Thank you Dr. Gayathri for taking care of all my problems and for always being there for me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited doctor Gayathri ma'am for my pregnancy check up. She is very responsive, caring and makes sure we are in the safe hands. I would highly recommend her for any gynaecology related issues. She makes sure we are confident on ourself and clears all our doubt. She has too much of patience which is really appreciable. The best thing about her is she is just a text away to clear all our doubts which we have during my pregnancy. She is very friendly and such a supportive Gynaec with great positive attitude. 
Thank you ma'am for your assistance and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We are very fortunate for being guided by Dr.Gayatri in these 9months journey, she is very friendly, caring and supportive throughout.
Because of her support and trust in her we decided to stay in Bangalore for child birth instead in our far off native place. Till child birth every thing went smooth even during these tough covid
We are grateful for her service and advice.
I can recommend her to anyone without any slightest of hesitation.👍
Thank you Gayatri ma'am 🤝🙏🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Gayathri B N for gestational - pregnancy of our second baby. Doctor’s timely diagnosis of gestational diabetes deserve special mention here. For couple of tests the sugars were normal yet the doctor insisted on getting tested again. The sugars were normal for most of the day however sporadic spike were observed. During 7th month of pregnancy my wife experienced pangs of backache. Doctor diagnosed it as probable infections in the body at the same time administered steroids for faster growth of the baby. The backache subsided once urinary infection was detected and diagnosed. She delivered to a healthy baby boy in 9th month of her pregnancy. Doctor handled the timing, COVID tests etc during the delivery very well. I strongly recommend Dr. Gayathri for women looking for a gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were looking for a good Doctor as my wife was pregnant with our 2nd Child. We came across Dr. Gayathri on this app and went for consultation. After that we didn't even considered for any 2nd opinion. We had continued visiting her through the whole time till our baby was delivered. She was really very patient & listened to all the issues which we had. Also very helpful & humble in providing explanations & resolution to each query we had. Due to an emergency during the last time in the pregnancy, we had to opt for Cesarean, otherwise from start Doctor suggested for normal delivery only. Our whole experience with Doctor was awesome & would definitely recommend her to others as well. In last, we just want to thank Doctor Gayathri for everything she has done for us. Thanks a lot Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When we moved to south Bangalore after few years of staying in north Bangalore, We were bit worried about finding good gynaecologist as we were planning for our second child. We were fortunate to discover Spectra clinic in Akshay nagar and in our first appointment with Dr Gayatri we had a sigh of relief! She is very patient and a great listener, ensures all problems are heard and discussed in length.My wife's pregnancy was bit complicated and to make it worse we were facing challenges during lockdown, Especially considering my wife was diagnosed with ovarian cyst. Those were most difficult times for us, but Dr.Gayatri has been very kind to us, she has been guiding us sensibly which helped us deal with all uncertainties! Today we are happy parents of two with little one beaming with cute smile! Thanks for everything Mam! We are forever grateful to you!Needless to say I strongly recommend Dr.Gayatri.

I am so thankful to her for the support and care she took since my start of pregnancy till the delivery and post delivery too. Dr.Gayathri is **** *************confident,friendly,gives appropriate advices.I strongly recommend Dr.Gayathri for pregnancy and other gyne related  issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Post Pregnancy Classes,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Family Planning,Gynaecological Endoscopy,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Gayathri from the time we started planning for a kid. She guided us and also took care at every stage. Even I had itching all over my body for liver enzymes increased on 36th week of pregnancy and baby movement reduced which could have been life threatening for the baby, to which doctor took a decision of doing early delivery and we have a healthy baby right now :)

Moreover she is so much caring about her patients through the journey of pregnancy and I will definitely recommend Dr. Gayathri.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very much thankful to Dr. Gayathri B N for her patience and situation handling. Everything is fine now only because of her else the situation would have been very critical. Went for general checkup but came to know that i have placental abruption immediately within no time she arranged everything n delivered a baby. In case if she had not taken the risk then the situation would have been very critical. Thanku so much to my doctor n hospital facilities. We had a very good hospitality by all the staff in the hospital.
Also very much thanks to Pediatrician Dr. Harish , Dr. Shylesh and NICU nursing staff .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We met Dr Gayatri at Rainbow Hospital for my pregnancy. She was referred by one of our friends. 

This was my second pregnancy, we had to terminate our first baby due to the baby's heart anomaly. We were super conscious, worried, and tensed from the beginning for this pregnancy due to the past history. 

From day one we met Dr Gayatri, we felt like we came to the right person. One of the main reasons is how well she cared for me and answered all our questions. The connection between patients and doctors should be in this way I would say. 

Another plus point about Dr Gayatri is she is available whenever you need her, we could just send her a message in WhatsApp any doubts or health related issues, she was always there to help. 

We wanted to have a normal delivery and Dr Gayatri also helped us to achieve it. She suggested proper exercise , food etc., and finally with her support we got our little baby girl on 26 July 2022. Happiest day of our life. 

Me and my husband want to thank you Dr for all your support. Thank you!!

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We Consulted Dr. Gayathri BN for entire 9 months of my pregnancy, we are finally blessed with a healthy baby boy by normal delivery under the supervision of Dr.Gayathri. The way Dr.Gayathri handled my entire pregnancy and delivery was commendable. She never asked for unnecessary tests/scans.She was always available for all my queries. She definitely has a personal touch with her patients. She was always positive in her approach and helped me steer through my pregnancy in a most convenient manner.
From the starting Dr.Gayathri guided us for healthy mother will have a healthy baby concept.
In this entire period, I feel blessed with the support, guidance, care and the empathy of Dr. Gayathri, she is an angel. 
Whenever I visited Dr. Gayathri I felt a new positivity and my energy level automatically has gone up, In the beginning of my pregnancy there were times when I felt very nervous and low and I will give Dr. Gayathri all the credit for giving me the strength, positivity and utmost care, she treats all her patients like a family member and gives all great advises with a big smile. She not only listens to everyone very patiently and calmly also gives personal touch to her patient.
I strongly recommend everyone to consult Dr. Gayathri and feel in safer hands throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have known Dr. Gayathri for more than 3 years now.  For any issues related to gynaecology I prefer to only visit Dr. Gayathri. I am personally very happy meeting her as I can frankly discuss any issues and get a very satisfying and scientific explanation around the cause, impact, cure and prevention of the issue. Dr. Gayathri is very approachable, patient not only in listening to the problem but also with her treatment approach. I have never experienced a long list of tests and unnecessary medication prescribed to me for any problem. 

All her treatment plans have worked for issues around menstruation, urinary track infections and now very recently got some advice on preparing for menopause and what to expect.

I highly recommend Dr. Gayathri who goes beyond just treating an ailment but provides good advice on how to ensure issues don’t repeat. Good advice to middle aged working women on how important it is to cultivate a lifestyle that prioritises health. Thank you Dr. Gayathri.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Do not recommend the doctor and the hospital. Our medical reports were delayed, had to follow up on the phone to get all the reports. The doctor paid almost no attention to the reports, we felt a lack of empathy towards us. **** *** **** ********* **** *** ******* ** *** *****

We are really glad that we choose her as doctor and highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
For all ladies and upcoming parents, Dr Gayatri is great gynaecologist.
I’m so thankful to have Dr.Gayathri as my Gynae throughout the pregnancy, labor and delivery process. She guided me throughout this journey. She always encouraged me to eat healthy in order to maintain a proper weight. She is very approachable. Anytime you ring up or drop a message, she quickly answer.  She is very caring and guided me on every concern which kept me confident throughout this journey and even after delivery as well she guided very well. It was because of her medical advice and instructions, I was able to give birth to a healthy baby boy with normal delivery. She was very confident and tried her best for my normal delivery..I would like to say thank you so much for care during my pregnancy and for the safe delivery of our baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: we visited spectra clinic to show case my wife's pregnancy and delivery to doctor Gayathri.Doctor is very patience in listening to the problems and explain everything in detail along with remedy actions. Doctor always go for normal delivery and prescribe for cesarean only if it is not possible for normal. My wife's baby was not growing fast and hence the doctor prescribed medicines along with disquettes which helped in baby growth.Doctor visit the clinic towards the end of the day and though we might be last patient yet doctor listens to all of our questions/issues and explains in detail what happens and how to deal some of the critical situations.Operation performed by the doctor is painless to my wife and without even any support my wife started walking from 25th hour after operation.I would recommend the doctor 100%.Thanks a lot doctor for your valuable suggestions, exercises, medicines, disquettes & everything you gave to my wife.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tubectomy/Tubal Ligation,Pregnancy,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We were looking for * **** gyanec as my wife was pregnant for our second kid. We came across the doctor from a recommendation of my colleague. After visiting her at Rainbow children's hospital we dint look for a second opinion. Later on we consulted her at spectra diagnostics. She has lots of patience to listen to all your problems and suggest the treatment only as required. We had a c section in our first pregnancy, hence we had to go for a c section this time as well. As my wife was anemic we were too concerned. But doctor took good care of her and made sure that things would go fine. She was always available on phone for any queries. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a gynaec without any second thought. Thanks a lot doctor for all your support and guidance throughout. Our baby is now 19days and we are super happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor helped me through the process of MTP, she guided me very well about the steps and consequences. Doctor was always available on call as well as msg in emergency. So helpful and caring till the discharge as well as follow up. 
History started from getting irregular periods after my wedding, henceforth I missed my safe period and got conceived. Me and my husband were definitely not ready to carry it on. I found Dr. Gayatri at a clinic near my stay and consulted her. She was so kind and understood my problem well and helped me to come out of it without any complications. She is also conserned about the amount that we need to spend on the procedures. She always tried to reduce our expenses. Am so thankful that she made it happen with reasonable amount spent at hospital for the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am so happy to have her as my doctor. She explains everything very politely even if you ask multiple times. She responds even  in whatsapp very quickly and never hesitate to help even at late night. I delivered my baby safely with help of Gayathri Mam .Her friendliness is highly commandable .I didn't think about second opinion of checking another doctor after seeing her. Even I found her through practo review only .She is helping me even in the postpartum period .Thanks to you mam . Kindly provide the same service to all upcoming Mothers.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: In Apollo Clinic at reception me and my wife simply told we have online appointment with Dr. Gayathri for follicular scan the girl at reception again confirm us only for follicular scan you came we said yes then they charge us 700rs after visiting this doctor she said who refer you to Dr Apporva we said the doctor in our home town refered us then the doctor said she will not do scan for us because we are not regular patient of her then we said why these people charged us 700rs that is only for talking with me then Dr. Gayathri Started suggesting us about pkgs of scan and all we said we need only one time scan then she said deposit 1000rs more for scan usually it is not expected from doctor because usually we pay 500rs only of scan and consultation both then doctor said this is hospital policy you have to pay the reason of sharing this story is we are very dissappointed with this doctor and hospital policies

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Dr. Gayatri is one of the most kind and experienced doc..,she helped me from day one to till and after  my child birth, she explained us thoroughly about my problem more over she helped us like anything in each and every minute of my pregnancy journey whenever we need her guidence, she is the most lovely human being more than a doc , very soft , very polite , I would say she is a blessing for those who are trying to conceive a baby , she is a person sent by God to make our dream come true of a baby...  She  never recommend any extra tests , unnessary medicine nothing, I am so blessed that she is my Gynee Dr, with her support and guidence I am bleessed with a baaby boy after 10 years of my marriage... And would love to plan 2nd baby with only and only Dr. Gayatri mam guidence.

review: We were very much concerned about the NVD as most of the doctors we have visited didn't give clearity about normal delivery. They used to say that it will depend on the situation whether it will be normal or C-section. As we were planning normal delivery we were very much worried. After meeting Dr. Gayathri who advised ua to do few excercise and   assured us that the delivery will be normal and she did the fantastic job and finally we are blessed with a lovely baby boy. We (Nirmala and Moni) would like to thank Dr. Gayathri.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: At the time of my 1st pregnancy scanning it was diagnosed that along with the baby there is a fibroid inside my uterus which leads to a  complicated pregnancy with chances of miscarriage since then it developed super hypertension within me but thank God Doctor Gayatri was with us, under her expertise and friendly guidance n treatment I delivered a baby boy, despite being a high-risk case. She even supports us at the time of the pandemic and lockdown she answered each of the messages with a solution. Thank you so much, Dr. Gayatri.

In short, we had a great experience with her. I started seeing Dr. Gayatri last year, when I quickly found out that conceiving would be a struggle as I had pcod.. She made both my husband and myself extremely comfortable during a stressful situation. She is incredibly knowledgeable and patient. tags: None
review:
Dr. Gayathri BN was quite polite, understanding and explained every aspect properly. 
The only concern was with the Front office as,
I was charged more than the mentioned amount on Practo. Felt like been charged unnecessarily more, without any justification.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I will prefer this doctor for my wife's second pregnancy(if any). She did normal delivery and my wife gave birth to baby girl. Thanks to Gayathri mam for immense support and she is available just a call away. Whenever we will call her she will pick up the call and patiently listen to our issue and will resolve the issue. Thanks to Rainbow Hospital Bannerghatta, and Gayathri mam.

Adios Amigos!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Gayatri madam is very nice,she gives nice treatment,since 2017 we have been visiting her clinic. I met her regarding my wife's pregnancy..from third month after conceive she gave nice priscription,and guidance.when we have some emergency we used to call madam , immediately she used to respond.it is more usefull for some times because as of we know in banglore some doctors they won't respond on Sundays but Gayatri madam not like that.
                Thank u madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ****** ** *** *** *** listen to your problem and give solutions to u without panicking your patient. Dr. Gayatri BN was very supportive, listened  to all the problem very calmly,  and advice only important scan and tests. She was always available on call and wats app when ever i wanted. Really thankful to her for staying throughout my pregnancy journey. I would definitely recommend Dr. Gayatri BN

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had miscarriage for 2 times soon after i consulted Dr Gayathri B N  from the day 1 she cared and she started giving treatment from the Day we met. we followed all the instructions n suggestions  to us... she is very friendly n having so much of patience. Through out my pregnancy I was worried regarding my delivery and baby growth But by Doctor suggestions  now we are blessed with beautiful angel. Thank you Sooo much mam for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: It was a very easy journey because Gayatri ma'am is super friendly and she made it very easy to get me through the journey. Her way of handling her patients is amazing. Very kind and very strict towards the health of her heart. And also her way of describing the issue and also how it will be resolved is nice. The way she treated was amazing. Very happy I was. Best doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: Gayatri doctor is so friendly. She took a good care for me in pregnancy. My first pregnancy was aborted due to antibodies and my second pregnancy we went to Gayatri doctor. I delivered baby without any complications. Thanks to Gayatri for her support and good care of me.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dear Dr. Gayatri I’m not sure how to begin to thank you. My wife and I have never met such a patient, sincerely interested in their patients well-being, doctor. You are incredible at what you do and we’re SO thankful we found you! 
 thank-you for taking care of my wife and baby, during her pregnancy and delivery. 
I must admit there were some tense moments for me but I really am so glad you were there to guide and advise A-Z & blessed outcome.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ****** ** *** ******** ** *** *********** ***** *** *** *** * she was checking other patients file when she was explaining to us! Not value for what you pay and not satisfied. 

There’s no staff to guide us where to go after registration and super slow , non-friendly staffs at Apollo Electronic City.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I had to wait for more than an hour for doctor to just come when I have booked an appointment at 5pm,  doc was only there at 6 pm and the front staff kept saying that she is coming in 15 mins, she Is just 10mins away , she is parking the car , she is just here and stretched it to 6 pm I was there at 4.55 to make sure I’m on time 

I don’t thank taking a appointment from practo is any good as the doctors don’t care about your confirmations or Patients time 

Thank you

tags: Wait time,
review: We ended up waiting for more than an hour and we still did not get to see the doctor since she had not reported for duty. this was after us taking appointment a day in advance at 5 till beyond 6 she made us wait then we decided to leave. Really disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly. She will give good explanation about health issues. She will understand our issues. More than medicines she will suggest for home remedies as some  medicines will hav side effects. And she is available any time on phone for any emergencies. She is very polite n gd hearted. I am very much satisfied about her treatment and surely i recommend her if any one asks for gynache doctor.
